RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: My research activity focuses on the neural mechanisms of consciousness and on their alterations in health and disease. In the last 10 years, in collaboration with dr. Giulio Tononi at the University of Wisconsin ? Madison and with dr. Steven Laureys at the Coma Science Group of the University of Liege, I?ve been developing novel neurophysiological tools to study the neural correlates of consciousness in sleep, anesthesia and coma. Currently, we are applying these tools in brain-injured patients who are in coma, in the vegetative state as well as in patients who gradually recover consciousness. Our research activity takes place in our lab at the Department of Biomedical and Clinical Sciences, in the Division for Vegetative Patients of Fondazione Don Gnocchi and in the department of Neurointensive care of Ospedale Niguarda.

Currently, we are applying these tools in brain-injured patients who are in coma, in the vegetative state as well as in patients who gradually recover consciousness. Our research activity takes place in our lab at the Department of Biomedical and Clinical Sciences, in the Division for Vegetative Patients of Fondazione Don Gnicchi and in the department of Neurointensive care of Ospedale Niguarda.
